#summary Declaration of interface indexers.
<wiki:toc max_depth="3"/>

= Interface indexer declaration =
The syntax to declare a indexer in an interface is specified by:
<blockquote><em>
interface-property-declaration:
    annotations<sub>opt</sub> type <tt>this</tt> `[` formal-parameter-list `]` { interface-accessors }
</em></blockquote>
The specified accessors are implicitly {{{public}}} and {{{abstract}}}.
